name: WhiskChat Server
tagline: An advanced multimedia chatroom, based off CoinChat.
body:
## Join/leave notifications
![Join Room Notifications](http://i.imgur.com/E95425j.png)
Get notified when your friends sign on and log out. Don't be in the dark!

## Embedded Multimedia
![Spotify Embed](http://i.imgur.com/5XLrSP1.png)
No need to paste links to your media. You can embed it right in-chat, and listen to it too! Great for sharing music with friends.

## Tipping
![Tipping](http://i.imgur.com/jUFIImq.png)
Tip mWC (virtual money) to your friends. In WhiskChat, we made tipping easier to implement, for tipbots and clients alike.

## Earning
![Earning](http://i.imgur.com/CfcjX1F.png)
Earn any amount from 0 to 1 mWC in one chat!

## Full BBCode support
![BBCode](http://i.imgur.com/PRND5Qw.png)
We fully support BBCode! A list of supported tags, with the code, can be found [here.](https://github.com/whiskers75/whiskchat-bbcode/blob/master/lib/bbcode.js)

## Desktop notifications
![WebKit Notifications](http://i.imgur.com/1bcdLnV.png)
If your browser supports WebKit notifications, you can get notifications when someone mentions you while you are doing other things! Never miss an important message again!

## Completely open source
![Code](http://i.imgur.com/tL7N0YX.png)
WhiskChat Server and Client are completely open source, both licenced under the [GPL v2](http://choosealicense.com/licenses/gpl-v2/). Feel free to fork both [client](https://github.com/whiskers75/whiskchat) and [server](https://github.com/WhiskTech/whiskchat-server)!

# [Join today!](http://whiskers75.github.io/whiskchat/whiskchat.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
